title: Courgette flower and chard tart
description: A delicious way to use seasonal courgette flowers.
ingredients: 8 large Swiss rainbow chard leaves, white stalks discarded, roughly chopped
6 courgette flowers, cut in half lengthways if large or 1 courgette, thinly sliced lengthways
50g/1¾oz Parmesan (or other vegetairan hard cheese), finely grated
